markdownRemark.html: Set in the hills between Marbella and Elviria. This is an exclusive 9 hole (par 3) golf course that is enjoyable but challenging at the same time. Especially for those wanting to master a short game. Approximately 60 metres in length and designed by Manuel Pinero, the course’s tees and greens lie on different levels at almost every hole, with lakes and ravines in between.

frontmatter.title: El Soto Golf and Leisure
frontmatter.description: El Soto Golf and Leisure - Set in the hills between Marbella and Elviria. This is an exclusive 9 hole (par 3) golf course that is enjoyable but challenging at the same time. Especially for those wanting to master a short game. Approximately 60 metres in length and designed by Manuel Pinero, the course’s tees and greens lie on different levels at almost every hole, with lakes and ravines in between.
frontmatter.address: Urb El Soto, La Mairena 29610 Marbella, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 15.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 15.00 euros
tags: Top golf courses Costa del Sol
